text.toast.title: PiShock Integration
text.autoconfig.pishock-mc.title: PiShock Configuration
text.autoconfig.pishock-mc.option.enable: Should the entire mod be enabled?
text.autoconfig.pishock-mc.option.damage:
Get punished for taking damage.
The shock intensity varies based on the damage taken.
Minimal shock intensity for taking damage.
Maximal shock intensity for taking 10 hearts of damage.
text.autoconfig.pishock-mc.option.secret:
=== DO NOT SHARE THIS ===
PiShock API Secrets
Use serial port instead of Web API

Use the serial port for communication with the PiShock device.
This is MUCH faster than the Web API, but requires a direct usb connection to the PiShock device.

The name of the serial port to use for communication with the PiShock device.
ONLY REQUIRED WHEN USING SERIAL PORT.

The ID of the Shocker to use.
ONLY REQUIRED WHEN USING SERIAL PORT.

Your PiShock Username
ONLY REQUIRED WHEN USING WEBAPI.

Your PiShock API Key
ONLY REQUIRED WHEN USING WEBAPI.

Your PiShock Sharecode
ONLY REQUIRED WHEN USING WEBAPI.
damage.attack.anvil: %1$s took %2$s damage from a falling anvil
damage.attack.anvil.player: %1$s took %2$s damage from a falling anvil while fighting %3$s
damage.attack.arrow: %1$s was shot and took %2$s damage from %3$s
damage.attack.arrow.item: %1$s was shot and took %2$s damage from %3$s using %4$s
damage.attack.cactus.player: %1$s walked into a cactus and took %2$s damage while trying to escape %3$s
damage.attack.cramming: %1$s took %2$s damage from being squished too much
damage.attack.cramming.player: %1$s was squashed by %3$s and took %2$s damage
damage.attack.dragonBreath.player: %1$s took %2$s damage from dragon's breath by %3$s
damage.attack.drown.player: %1$s took %2$s damage from drowning while trying to escape %3$s

damage.attack.even_more_magic: %1$s took %2$s damage from even more magic
damage.attack.explosion.player: %1$s was blown up by %3$s and took %2$s damage
damage.attack.explosion.player.item: %1$s was blown up by %3$s using %4$s and took %2$s damage
damage.attack.fall.player: %1$s took %2$s damage from falling while trying to escape %3$s
damage.attack.fallingBlock: %1$s took %2$s damage from a falling block
damage.attack.fallingBlock.player: %1$s took %2$s damage from a falling block while fighting %3$s

damage.attack.fallingStalactite.player: %1$s was skewered and took %2$s damage from a falling stalactite while fighting %3$s
damage.attack.fireball: %1$s was fireballed and took %2$s damage from %3$s
damage.attack.fireball.item: %1$s was fireballed and took %2$s damage from %3$s using %4$s
damage.attack.fireworks: %1$s took %2$s damage from a firework explosion
damage.attack.fireworks.item: %1$s took %2$s damage from a firework explosion due to %4$s fired by %3$s
damage.attack.fireworks.player: %1$s took %2$s damage from a firework explosion while fighting %3$s
damage.attack.flyIntoWall: %1$s experienced kinetic energy and took %2$s damage
damage.attack.flyIntoWall.player: %1$s experienced kinetic energy and took %2$s damage while trying to escape %3$s
damage.attack.hotFloor: %1$s took %2$s damage from the hot floor
damage.attack.hotFloor.player: %1$s walked into the danger zone and took %2$s damage due to %3$s
damage.attack.inFire.player: %1$s walked into fire and took %2$s damage while fighting %3$s
damage.attack.inWall: %1$s suffocated in a wall and took %2$s damage
damage.attack.inWall.player: %1$s suffocated in a wall and took %2$s damage while fighting %3$s
damage.attack.lava.player: %1$s took %2$s damage from lava while trying to escape %3$s
damage.attack.lightningBolt: %1$s was struck by lightning and took %2$s damage
damage.attack.lightningBolt.player: %1$s was struck by lightning and took %2$s damage while fighting %3$s
damage.attack.magic.player: %1$s took %2$s damage from magic while trying to escape %3$s
damage.attack.onFire.item: %1$s was burned and took %2$s damage while fighting %3$s wielding %4$s
damage.attack.onFire.player: %1$s was burned and took %2$s damage while fighting %3$s
damage.attack.outOfWorld: %1$s fell out of the world and took %2$s damage
damage.attack.outOfWorld.player: %1$s didn't want to live in the same world as %3$s and took %2$s damage
damage.attack.outsideBorder: %1$s left the confines of this world and took %2$s damage
damage.attack.outsideBorder.player: %1$s left the confines of this world and took %2$s damage while fighting %3$s
